title: Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area: Professional Development
body: Professional Development        Teacher-Ranger-Teachers Are you a teacher interested in spending the summer in a national park?  The national Teacher-Ranger-Teacher program offers classroom teachers a stipend to work 6-8 weeks in a national park, develop curriculum-based materials, and share their park experience with their students.  All Teacher-Ranger-Teachers   Teacher-Ranger-Teachers    Teacher-Ranger-Teachers in action Learn More     Teacher Workshops Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area offers free professional development workshops throughout the year. Workshops vary in length from a few hours to 3-days, and are conducted in various locations throughout Los Angeles and Ventura counties. All Teacher Workshops   Teacher workshops     Teachers look at pictures for class project. Learn More
